comments.comment: I oppose the rezoning proposal because a higher height limit could change the character of the residential area and potentially impact property values negatively.

As a student with a limited income, I am concerned that increasing the height limit in a nearby residential zone could lead to higher property values, making it even more difficult for me to afford living in the area. I value the current community character and worry that this change could disrupt the neighborhood's charm.
I oppose the rezoning proposal as it could potentially impact the character of our residential area and lead to increased traffic and noise.
